title: Teen Shot on Beech Street in Chattanooga
content:
CHATTANOOGA, Tenn. — Chattanooga Police are investigating after a 15-year-old was shot in the stomach.
The incident happened outside a home on the 1700 block of Beech Street shortly after 1 p.m.
The teen was rushed to the hospital.
Investigators remain on the scene, interviewing witnesses.
One neighbor says she her 4 or 5 gunshots.
UPDATE: The boy's injuries are not life-threatening.
Police also say this is domestic-related and not associated with gangs.
This is a developing story. Depend on us to bring you updates as we get them.
